mapper.select: select dic.id as id, dic.dic_code as dicCode, dic.dic_content as dicContent, dic.sort as sort, dic.pid as pid, dic2.dic_content as pidContent, dic.enabled as enabled, dic.create_user_id as createUserId, dic.del_flag as delFlag from (select d.id,d.dic_code,d.dic_content,d.sort,d.pid,d.enabled,d.create_user_id,d.del_flag from sys_data_dic d) dic, (select id,dic_content from sys_data_dic) dic2 where dic.pid=dic2.id and dic.pid=#{pid} and dic.del_flag='N' order by dic.sort
